summary: Extends all shrine blessings (including Auri-El's blessing and the daedric blessings) to 1 week of duration. Requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
Just a little convenience mod that extends blessings from shrines from 8 hours to 168 hours (one week).Â  Includes the Auri-El shrine from Dawnguard and the Azura, Boethia, and Mephala shrines from Dragonborn.

This version of the mod requires both the Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLC. Other mods exist that provide a similar effect just for vanilla shrines, I made this one myself as a convenience for those who needed an all-DLC Legendary edition.

Permissions
========
Do anything you feel like with it, with or without crediting me.
author: Chuckg
